data.title: ILMS at Cotton University
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Online Integrated Learning Management System of Cotton University. This is an institutional arrangement of Cotton University for providing blended mode of education as per the guidelines of MOOCs. The various courses currently provided with this facility  is listed here in this site.
data.text:
Cotton University (formerly known as Cotton College) is a Public State University located in Guwahati, Assam, India. It was established in 2017 by the provisions of an Act enacted by Assam Legislative Assembly to merge the Cotton College State University and Cotton College.

Read More »
